name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WiseCard - Make Twitter post to a nice card.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make A Quote is a Chrome browser extension that enables users to easily transform their favorite posts when using Twitter into a beautiful card. With this handy tool, you can effortlessly capture those captivating moments and convert them into stunning cards for a lasting memory.

Looking to cherish the fascinating posts on Twitter? Make A Quote extension comes to your aid, allowing you to generate beautiful cards with just one click. It effortlessly turns your favorite posts into visually appealing cards, making your Twitter experience even more delightful.

Contact with me:
